title: Tech News: Meta's Numbers are on the Rise Again
itunes:title: Tech News: Meta's Numbers are on the Rise Again
description:
Meta saw more users join its services, giving investors more confidence in the company. Amazon is in a tussle with the Australian government. And the UK plans to fine streaming services that display "harmful content." 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: Meta, Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, metaverse, Apple, Amazon, Netflix, Australia, anticompetitive, right to repair, video games, gaming, online games, extremism, far-right
